sentences.en: He is the greatest quarterback in gridiron history.
sentences.cn: 他是橄榄球场历史上最伟大的四分卫。

sentences.en: She turned a cake on the gridiron.
The box office of Gridiron Gang released by Sony Pictures reached 14 million this week!
sentences.cn: 本周索尼公司推出的电影“重振球风”的票房收入达到了一千四百万!

sentences.en: They laid the prisoner on the gridiron.
sentences.cn: 他们使这个囚犯备受折磨.

trans.tran_cn: （炙烤食物用的）烤架，美式橄榄球球场，船架，火刑铁格
trans.tran_en: an open frame of metal bars for cooking meat or fish over a very hot fire
